value.string: Assigning the Dump File and DD report file path with name to the variable.
Opening the Dump and DD report files
Iterating each row from the SAP Sheet in Dump file
Skipping first row as data starts from 2nd row
Filtering the data with Posting Key as "40" and Mission name should not be "empty"
Filtering out the data with Cash transaction from Text column like BNA, CASH, CONSO

value.expression:
Reading from SAP Sheet

Doc. Date - $SAPRow[5]$..
Pstng Date - $SAPRow[6]$..
PK - $SAPRow[8]$..
Amt in Local - $SAPRow[10]$..
Mission - $SAPRow[15]$..
Text - $SAPRow[18]$..

value.string: Iterating the DD Report file for finding out the DDs for the amount from SAP sheet
Match the SAP Mission name with records from DD report file
Logic to convert the DD collection date into the Doc Date from SAP

value.expression:
Reading from DD Report file

Mission - $DDReportRecord[0]$
Date: $DDCollectionDate$
DD - $DDReportRecord[2]$
DD AMt - $DDReportRecord[3]$

value.string: Skip the record if the DD Collection date is not matching with SAP Doc Date
Switching to the Bank Sheet to finding out the DD details
Iterating the records of Bank Sheet from the dump file to get the match of DD into the bank statement
Skipping first 6 row as data is availabe after 7th row
Filtering the records with DD amount to Bank Statement amount & DD number into the Description column into the DD report file

value.expression:
Matched Records 

Description - $BankSheetRow[3]$
Amount -  $BankSheetRow[6]$
Counter - $BankWriteCounter-string$
Balance - $BankBalanaceValue-String$

value.string: Check all the DD found then exit the bank transaction records
Check all the DD found then exit the DD report records
Check if all the DD matches then update the Close status for all the entires in bank statement and SAP record entry
Else check if there is any DD entry not found in bank statement then write close status
check if there is any single DD entry found in bank statement then write partial status
Close both DD report file and SAP dump file

variables.name: prompt-assignment
variables.description: A variable you can use for assignments

defaultValue.string: OPEN, No Mission Found in DD Report
